text:
Chronic pain took seven
years of my life from me.

I remember years ago crying
in my bed in a dark room

after I was told how I
had no hope to get better

and I'd have to deal with
this for the rest of my life.

I refused to believe that,
and I took two years off

of my career at Google to
study chronic pain full time.

I scoured the web only to
find fragmented and unhelpful
results.
I met with over 50 doctors.

It was a huge time cost
and financial cost.

And I'm lucky I was
able to find a team who
helped me get my life back.
I learned I wasn't alone.

1 in 3 Americans are
suffering from chronic pain.

And the overall costs of pain
outweigh the cost of cancer,

heart disease, and
diabetes combined.

And it has created a second
crisis, the opioid epidemic.

It should not be this way when
there are scientifically backed
tools that patients can use.

They just need to be
educated that they exist.

We're focusing on the
health inequities,

particularly for the 40 million
women and people of color

that are
disproportionately impacted
by chronic pain in the US.

Between our team, we have 15
years working in health care

technology and chronic
pain, and have experience

in places like Google, Planned
Parenthood, and Blue Cross Blue
Shield.

Feather Health is an AI
powered digital platform

that one, connects patients
with practitioners, two,

provides personalized pain
coaching, and three, offers
a supportive community.

Too many lives have
been taken because we've

continued to pursue the same
old approach to managing
chronic pain.
I'm Kirsten Soong.

And at Feather, we believe
that living a life without pain
is a human right.

And we hope you'll
join us on our journey.
